course_title: Acute and Chronic Care: Clinical Practicum Adult and Geriatric Populations
class_notes: This class is for D-ABSN semester 1 students only. On campus intensive: TBA
course_description: This first clinical practicum course focuses on planning and implementing care for adults/older adult populations with alterations in health in acute care settings. Clinical learning focuses on developing competency in basic nursing skills, assessment, communication and care documentation.
sections: Class Nbr: 2509, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Haynes Ferere, Status: Open
